snippet.title: AK-xolotl - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The cutest, deadliest and ONLY top-down roguelite shooter featuring AK-wielding Axolotls.
++Free Demo available on Steam Now:  https://tinyurl.com/Steam-AKxolotl

Coming Fall 2023 to PC, Nintendo Switch, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, and Xbox One.

Join us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/4eBtPE4
